glsa.title: mpg321: Format string vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A flaw in the processing of ID3 tags in mpg321 could potentially lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: mpg321 is a GPL replacement for mpg123, a command line audio player with support for ID3. ID3 is a tagging system that allows metadata to be embedded within media files.

description.p: A routine security audit of the mpg321 package revealed a known security issue remained unpatched. The vulnerability is a result of mpg321 printing embedded ID3 data to the console in an unsafe manner.

impact.p: Successful exploitation would require a victim to play a specially crafted audio file using mpg321, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
